title: The Woman in Black
description: This ghost story was first published in hardback in 1983 and has gone on to have a remarkable life over the following decades, in various paperback incarnations, as a set book for GCSE and A Level, and as a play, adapted by Stephen Mallatratt and running in Londonâ€™s West End since 1988 and round the world.
author: Susan         Hill
